title: roasted chicken with green chutney and zesty salad
description: This dish brings bags of flavour to the traditional roast chicken. Served with a spicy green chutney and zesty salad of green beans and peas it is perfect for impressing at a dinner party. For this dish you will need a blender to make the chutney.
ingredients: 1 long green chilli, deseeded and chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
